mapper.select: select * from wb_app_version a where a.platform = #{platform} and a.role_type = #{roleType} and file_url is not null and file_url <> '' and not exists (select 1 from wb_app_version b where b.platform = a.platform and b.role_type = a.role_type and b.create_time > a.create_time and file_url is not null and file_url <> '')
mapper.insert: insert into wb_app_version (id, role_type, platform,version_code, force_update, file_url, description,operator, create_time, update_time) values (#{pojo.id}, #{pojo.roleType}, #{pojo.platform}, #{pojo.versionCode}, 0, #{pojo.fileUrl}, #{pojo.description}, #{pojo.operator}, current_timestamp , current_timestamp)
mapper.update:
update wb_app_version
force_update = #{pojo.forceUpdate,jdbcType=SMALLINT},
description = #{pojo.description},
operator = #{pojo.operator},
file_url = #{pojo.fileUrl},
update_time = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
where id = #{pojo.id}
